definition: A series of interconnected links or loops typically made of metal or other durable material, often worn around the neck or wrist as a decorative accessory or for fastening purposes. It is commonly used to hold pendants, charms, or other ornaments, or as a component in jewelry-making.

examples.english: I am wearing a gold chain.
The chain is made of pearls.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Kette um den Hals.
examples.english: She has a necklace around her neck.
